title: As a user I only want to see options in the Create New popover that I have permission to use
custom_steps:
Business Value:
Users are not presented with options in the Create New popover that they do not actually have permission to create. This story is specific to Major Contracts - additional stories will be needed to add in other Contract types.

See Wireframe:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=contracts

See Major Contracts Permissions: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2302884

Acceptance Criteria:
* Clicking on Create New launches the popover to select the type of item the user would like to create for the player. 
* Only the options that the user has permission to create for that user according to their user permissions will appear.  
* If the user has no permissions to create any items from here the button should not be present.

title: As a user I only want to see major contracts that I have permission to see in the Contract History
custom_steps:
Business Value:
Users do not see major contracts in the Contract History that they do not have permission to view.

See Wireframe:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=contracts

See Roles: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2302884

Acceptance Criteria:
* MJ Contract view access required to view any contract
* LRD/BOC users can view all contracts in any state.
* Club users from the Signing Club can view all contracts in any state. 
* Club users not from the Signing Club can view all contracts once terms are confirmed or the contract is approved.

title: Agent permissions
custom_steps:
Business Value: 
Users that should not be able to view or edit agent information are unable to do so.

Roles and Permissions: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2302884

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The agents widget has its own permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users without the permission cannot view the widget anywhere in the system.
* By default the ability to view the agents widget is given to BOC - Contracts - Basic role group and LRD - Contracts - Admin role group. 
* Viewing agent profiles is a permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users without the permission cannot view the profile anywhere in the system.
* By default the ability to view the agents is given to BOC - Contracts - Basic role group and LRD - Contracts - Admin role group. 
* Creating or editing agent profiles is a permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users without the permission cannot create or edit the profile anywhere in the system.
* By default the ability to edit the agents is given to the LRD - Contracts - Admin role group. 

*The ability to view agent and agency information in the player profile or other dropdowns throughout the system is NOT driven by these permissions. These strictly deal with the profiles and related processes themselves*

title: Agency permissions
custom_steps:
Business Value: 
Users that should not be able to view or edit agent information are unable to do so.

Roles and Permissions: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2302884

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The agency widget has its own permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users without the permission cannot view the widget anywhere in the system.
* By default the ability to view the agency widget is given to BOC - Contracts - Basic role group and LRD - Contracts - Admin role group. 
* Viewing agency profiles is a permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users without the permission cannot view the profile anywhere in the system.
* By default the ability to view the agencies is given to BOC - Contracts - Basic role group and LRD - Contracts - Admin role group. 
* Creating or editing agency profiles is a permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users without the permission cannot create or edit the profile anywhere in the system.
* By default the ability to edit the agencies is given to the LRD - Contracts - Admin role group. 

*The ability to view agent and agency information in the player profile or other dropdowns throughout the system is NOT driven by these permissions. These strictly deal with the profiles and related processes themselves*

title: Agent Club Roster action item permissions
custom_steps:
Business Value: 
Users that should not be able to view or edit agent information are unable to do so.

Roles and Permissions: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2302884

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Receiving an action item for a Club's Player/Agent Roster mapping is a permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users without the permission cannot receive action items for this or view the associated form anywhere in the system.
* By default this ability is given to the Club - Contracts - Admin role group.
* Approving or rejecting a Club's Player/Agent Roster mapping is a permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users without the permission cannot receive approvals items for this or view the submissions anywhere in the system.
* By default this ability is given to the LRD - Contracts - Admin role group.

title: Award Entry Utility Permissions
custom_steps:
Business Value: 
Users that should not be able to view or edit the award entry utility are unable to do so.

Roles and Permissions: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2302884

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The award entry utility has its own permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users without the permission cannot view the utility anywhere in the system.
* By default the ability to view the utility is given to BOC - Contracts - Basic role group and LRD - Contracts - Admin role group. 
* Editing the award entry utility is a permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users without the permission cannot edit the utility anywhere in the system.
* By default the ability to edit the utility is given to the LRD - Contracts - Admin role group. 

*The ability to view award information in the player's contract or other locations throughout the system is NOT driven by these permissions. These strictly deal with the utility*

title: Agent spreadsheet permissions
custom_steps:
Business Value: 
Users that should not be able to view or edit agent information are unable to do so.

Roles and Permissions: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2302884

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Importing the agent to agency mapping spreadsheet and its associated steps is a permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users without the permission cannot import this spreadsheet anywhere in the system.
* By default the ability to import the spreadsheet is given to the LRD - Contracts - Admin role group.
* Any user with the permission to import an agent/agency spreadsheet should see an "Import Spreadsheet" button on the Agents widget. 
* If a user does not have permission to import this spreadsheet, the button should not be displayed.

title: Permissions for Payments screen
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* The Payments screen should only be visible by BOC/LRD users. 
* The Payments screen is only editable by those BOC/LRD users that have permissions to edit MJ Contracts. 
* If the user does not have permission to view the Payments screen, they do not see the tab on the contract.

title: Deferred Comp Permissions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* Deferred Comp has its own set of permissions that can be added to BOC users that allows them to see the Deferred Comp tab of the Major Contracts dashboard. 
* If they can see the tab, then they can load the utility and see all Deferred Comp Info for all  Orgs. 
* Deferred Comp also has its own set of permissions that can be added to Club users that allows them to see the Deferred Comp tab of the Major Contracts dashboard. 
* If they can see the tab, then they can load the utility and ONLY see their own Org's Deferred Comp Info.

title: Payroll Report Utilities Permissions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* Accessing and updating the Payroll Report Utility is a permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users without the permission cannot view the utility anywhere in the system.
* By default this ability is given to the LRD - Contracts - Admin role group.
* The "Payroll Reports" tab should not appear on the Major Contracts dashboard for users that do not have access to this utility.

title: Payroll Forecast Permissions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* Accessing and updating the Payroll Forecast Utility is a permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users without the permission cannot view the utility anywhere in the system.
* By default this ability is given to the LRD - Contracts - Admin role group.
* The "Payroll Forecast" tab should not appear on the Major Contracts dashboard for users that do not have access to this utility.

title: Agent/Agency tab permissions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* The Agent/Agency tab should not display for users that do not have access to either the Agent or Agency widget.

title: Award Entry permissions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* The Award Entry screen should have its own view and edit permissions. 
* By default the View permissions are given to the BOC MJC Read Only account, and the Edit permissions are given to the BOC MJC Admin account. Club users will not have any access to this screen. 
* Users without either the view or edit permission should not see the tab at all.
